item.title: Common
item.description: Delete files older than x days # find /path/to/files* -mtime +5 -exec rm {} \; See also Delete Files Older Than x Days on Linux. View systemd logs # journalctl -u service-name.service See also: How to see full log from systemctl status service? How To Use Journalctl to View and Manipulate Systemd Logs

item.title: Ubuntu
item.description: Install .deb # sudo dpkg -i package-name.deb Set timezone # timedatectl set-timezone Asia/Shanghai Change NTP server # Open and Edit the configuration file vim /etc/systemd/timesyncd.conf Add(Uncomment) NTP servers under the [Time] like following [Time] NTP=10.0.0.1 Restart the service to apply the changes systemctl restart systemd-timesyncd.service To check time sync status timedatectl status See also How to change NTP server on Ubuntu 20.04.1 LTS simply
